file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.2 servers: - description: OkMall MINA Agent url: http://localhost:8013/mina/v1 info: description: OkMall MINA Agent API version: "1.0.0" title: OkMall MINA Agent API contact: email: alimy@gility.net license: name: Apache 2.0 url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html' paths: /index/index/: get: summary: Get main page data operationId: IndexData description: | Get main page data all in one request responses: '200': description: Main page data content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexDataWrap' '401': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorModel' /catalog/index/: get: summary: Get all catalog list operationId: CatalogList description: | Get catalog list data responses: '200': description: Catalog list data content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CatalogListDataWrap' links: currentCatalog: $ref: '#/components/links/CatalogCurrentInfo' '401': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorModel' /catalog/current/: get: summary: Get current catalog list operationId: CatalogCurrent description: | Get current catalog list parameters: - name: id in: path required: true schema: type: string responses: '200': description: Current catalog list data content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CatalogListDataWrap' '401': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorModel' components: links: CatalogCurrentInfo: # return object of '#/components/schemas/CatalogListDataWrap operationId: CatalogCurrent parameters: id: $response.body#/data/categoryList/id schemas: ErrorModel: type: object required: - errno - errmsg - data properties: errno: type: integer format: int32 example: 401 errmsg: type: string example: "Not Found" data: type: object SuccessModel: type: object required: - errno - errmsg properties: errno: type: integer format: int32 example: 200 errmsg: type: string example: "" IndexDataWrap: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessModel' - type: object required: - data properties: data: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexData' CatalogListDataWrap: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessModel' - type: object required: - data properties: data: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CatalogListData' Goods: type: object required: - id - name - list_pic_url - retail_price properties: id: type: string example: 116011 name: type: string example: "蔓越莓曲奇 200克" list_pic_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/767b370d07f3973500db54900bcbd2a7.png" retail_price: type: number format: float example: 36 IndexData: type: object required: - banner - channel - newGoodsList - hotGoodsList - brandList - topicList - categoryList properties: banner: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexBanner' channel: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexChannel' newGoodsList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexNewGoods' hotGoodsList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexHotGoods' brandList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexBrands' topicList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexTopics' categoryList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IndexCategories' IndexBanner: type: array items: type: object required: - id - ad_position_id - media_type - name - link - image_url - content - end_time - enabled properties: id: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 ad_position_id: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 media_type: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 name: type: string example: "合作 谁是你的菜" link: type: string image_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/65091eebc48899298171c2eb6696fe27.jpg" content: type: string example: "合作 谁是你的菜" end_time: type: integer format: int32 example: 0 enabled: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 IndexChannel: type: array items: type: object required: - id - name - url - icon_url - sort_order properties: id: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 name: type: string example: "居家" url: type: string example: "/pages/category/category?id=1005000" icon_url: type: string example: "http://ac-3yr0g9cz.clouddn.com/c031ea3cf575f885cd1c.png" sort_order: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 IndexNewGoods: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Goods' IndexHotGoods: type: array items: type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Goods' - type: object required: - goods_brief properties: goods_brief: type: string example: "一级桑蚕丝，吸湿透气柔软" IndexBrands: type: array items: type: object required: - id - name - list_pic_url - simple_desc - pic_url - sort_order - is_show - floor_price - app_list_pic_url - is_new - new_pic_u rl - new_sort_order properties: id: type: string example: 1026000 name: type: string example: "CK制造商" list_pic_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/658f09b7ec522d31742b47b914d64338.png" simple_desc: type: string example: 严选寻访Calvin Klein品牌的制造商，\n深入世界领带第一生产地，设计与品质并重，\n致力于给消费者带来优质典雅的服饰用品。" pic_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/fb139c9f11a10deb41beeb42aaad488e.png" sort_order: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 is_show: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 floor_price: type: number format: float example: 39 app_list_pic_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/658f09b7ec522d31742b47b914d64338.png" is_new: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 new_pic_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/76638fb8e6990aadf837ce761c3b7399.jpg" new_sort_order: type: integer example: 1 IndexTopics: type: array items: type: object required: - id - title - content - avatar - item_pic_url - subtitle - topic_category_id - price_info - read_count - scene_pic_url - topic_template_id - topic_tag_id - sort_order - is_show properties: id: type: string example: 314 title: type: string example: "关爱他成长的每一个足迹" content: type: string example: | "\n \n \n \n \n \n " avatar: type: string example: "https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/14943186689221563.png" item_pic_url: type: string example: "https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/14943267735961674.jpg" subtitle: type: string example: "专业运动品牌同厂，毛毛虫鞋买二送一" topic_category_id: type: integer format: int32 example: 2 price_info: type: number format: float example: 59.9 read_count: type: string example: "6.4k" scene_pic_url: type: string example: "https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/14943267735961674.jpg" topic_template_id: type: string example: 0 topic_tag_id: type: string example: 0 sort_order: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 is_show: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 IndexCategories: type: array items: type: object required: - id - name - goodsList properties: id: type: string example: 1023003 name: type: string example: "餐厨" goodsList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Goods' CatalogListData: type: object required: - categoryList - currentCategory properties: categoryList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CategoryList' currentCategory: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CategoryList' CategoryList: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Category' Category: &category type: object required: - id - name - keywords - front_desc - parent_id - sort_order - show_index - is_show - banner_url - icon_url - image_url - wap_banner_urlf - level - type - front_name properties: id: type: string example: 1005000 name: type: string example: "布艺软装" keywords: type: string example: "" front_desc: type: string example: "回家，放松身心" parent_id: type: string example: 1005001 sort_order: type: integer format: int32 example: 2 show_index: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 is_show: type: integer format: int32 example: 1 banner_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/92357337378cce650797444bc107b0f7.jpg" icon_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/a45c2c262a476fea0b9fc684fed91ef5.png" img_url: type: string example: "http://nos.netease.com/yanxuan/f0d0e1a542e2095861b42bf789d948ce.jpg" wap_banner_url: type: string example: "http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/e8bf0cf08cf7eda21606ab191762e35c.png" level: type: string example: "L1" front_name: type: string example: "回家，放松身心" subCategoryList: $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubCategoryList' SubCategoryList: type: array items: << : *category
